CustomField.description: Flag for CC pages to show Promo end date if the item is flagged as a Promotion. For longer promotions, only show towards the end of the promotion.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag for CC pages to show Promo end date if the item is flagged as a Promotion. For longer promotions, only show towards the end of the promotion.
CustomField.label: Show Promo End Date
